entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 12.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
